DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable related to the detection of Age-Related Clonal Hematopoiesis prior to chemotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Chemotherapy Age-Related Clonal Hematopoiesis Detection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Previous chemotherapy administered as treatment for this cancer._The gradual, clonal expansion of hematopoietic stem and progenitor cells carrying specific, disruptive, and recurrent genetic variants, in individuals without clear diagnosis of hematological malignancies. It is associated with an increased risk of developing hematologic cancers._The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Previous chemotherapy administered as treatment for this cancer.

Concepts.definition: Previous chemotherapy administered as treatment for this cancer.

Property.preferredDefinition: The gradual, clonal expansion of hematopoietic stem and progenitor cells carrying specific, disruptive, and recurrent genetic variants, in individuals without clear diagnosis of hematological malignancies. It is associated with an increased risk of developing hematologic cancers.:The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying.

Concepts.definition: The gradual, clonal expansion of hematopoietic stem and progenitor cells carrying specific, disruptive, and recurrent genetic variants, in individuals without clear diagnosis of hematological malignancies. It is associated with an increased risk of developing hematologic cancers.
The act of perceiving, discerning, discovering, or identifying.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
